title: Help me identifying this typography (I think is too easy)
content:
Hi to All, My name is Matias and I'm from Argentina... I'm need to identify this typography that I think is easy but I have no enough experience like you to do it, please help me, I will appreciate it.

Regards

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cpasarela.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015043205/http:/typophile.com/files/cpasarela.gif) | 9.68 KB |
author: elvarto

comments.content:
Yes!!! thank you so much! I appreciate it!  
Regards!
